title: How to invest into a farm if I don’t know how to farm - Quora

response.answer_text: In the USA you buy some dirt, throw down some seed and you are invested in a farm. It is also possible to buy the land and lease it out to farmers. If the land is not interesting buy stock in companies similar to Cargill. They provide services to farms and in some cases own farms. There are also a couple of REITs that invest in land and lease it out to farmers. Mike
